SteamWorld Dig - this steampunk western, combining platforming and sandbox, according to developers hybrid Super Metroid and Terraria. Arm pick and forward into the ground, looking for water, minerals, precious metals and various traces of the presence of humans and their technology. Going for miles, but be careful, the bottom die easily, narwhal in any kind of monsters, but this is not the main problem: climb down easy, but to get to the surface can be difficult. Currently, SteamWorld Dig considered the best indie game on 3DS, on par with Animal Crossing: New Leaf! At the heart of the game is known concept projects Mr.Do, Dig Dug and Digger, published in the early 80s. Hero engaged in excavations in the cave, pockets the values, trying to avoid a meeting with cruel boy and falling boulders on your head. Game mechanics is constantly evolving and complicated, each improvement makes Rusty little stronger. Due to this SteamWorld Dig draws from the first until the last minute. A great example of how the ancient foundations can create something entirely new.
